instructions: In a latte glass, combine espresso and vanilla syrup.
Steam the milk to 150 degrees Fahrenheit and froth it until it is velvety in texture.
Pour the steamed milk into the glass with the espresso and vanilla syrup. The beverage should be 1/3 espresso and syrup and 2/3 steamed milk.
Spoon a thin layer of frothed milk over top of the drink.
garnishes: Dust with cinnamon or cocoa powder (optional)
